#154 0' 0.5"
1.32 lbs. 		Attaching Pokémon Since they can't generate their own electricity, they attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static electricity, which they store in a pouch.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Compound Eyes 8 The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.
1 Unnerve 4 Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
18 Illuminate 5 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
36 Swarm 5 Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
54 Lifelink 7 The Pokémon may restore some of its HP after making contact.
72 Frostproof 6 The Pokémon resists Ice-type moves and cannot be frostbitten.
90 Tinted Lens 7 The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
100 Galvanize 8 Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 04 Insomnia 5 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Disc 07 Illuminate 5 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 09 Swarm 5 Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Disc 13 Cloud Nine 6 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Disc 16 Lifelink 7 The Pokémon may restore some of its HP after making contact.
Disc 23 Frostproof 6 The Pokémon resists Ice-type moves and cannot be frostbitten.
Disc 38 Compound Eyes 8 The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.
Disc 45 Toxic Boost 6 Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.
Disc 48 Oblivious 3 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Adaptability 8 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Berserk 6 Boosts its Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
Cold-Blooded 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Electric Surge 9 Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Electromorphosis 2 The Pokémon becomes Charged up when it takes damage.
Galvanize 8 Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Immunity 4 The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Lightning Rod 7 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Poison Heal 8 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
Shield Dust 7 This Pokémon's dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
Short Circuit 5 The Pokémon creates a thunderstorm when it's hit by an attack.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Sludge Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in acid rain.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Static 5 The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
Tinted Lens 7 The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
Transistor 4 Powers up Electric-type moves.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unnerve 4 Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
Volt Absorb 8 Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
Volt Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a thunderstorm.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
